  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086258</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">"How to tell a Chinese from a 'Jap.'"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">", wie man erklärt einen Chinesen von einem ' 
Jap.'"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">"comment dire un chinois d'un 'Jap.'"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">"como dizer um chinês ' de um Jap.'"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">"come dire ad un cinese 'da un Jap.'"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">"Πώς να πει σε έναν Κινέζο από ένα" Jap.""</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">"cómo decir un chino de un ' Jap.'"</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">During World War II, Chinese Americans, who had often been lumped together with other Asians and even called Japs</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Während des Zweiten Weltkrieges lumped chinesische 
Amerikaner, die häufig gewesen waren, zusammen mit anderen Asiaten 
und benannten sogar Japs</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pendant la deuxième guerre mondiale, les Américains 
chinois, qui avaient souvent été lumped ainsi que d'autres 
Asiatiques et ont même appelé Japs</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Durante a segunda guerra mundial, os americanos chineses, 
que tinham sido frequentemente lumped junto com outros asians e 
chamaram mesmo Japs</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Durante la seconda guerra mondiale, gli Americani 
cinesi, che erano stati spesso lumped insieme ad altri asiatici e 
perfino hanno chiamato Japs</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατά τη διάρκεια του παγκόσμιου πολέμου ΙΙ, κινεζικοί
Αμερικανοί, οι οποίοι ήταν συσσωρευμένων συχνά μαζί με άλλους 
Ασιάτες και κάλεσαν ακόμη και Japs</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial, los americanos chinos, 
que habían estado a menudo lumped junto con otros asiáticos e 
incluso llamaron a Japs</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>

          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

        </metaMetadata>

        </educational>

    </metadata>
  </description>
